FuncDef: The display split-resume command displays the slave chassis mode when both the inter-chassis control link and data link fail in virtual cluster scenarios.
Examples: Split resume mode is slave reset flag.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In virtual cluster scenarios, the slave chassis mode must be set to fast-preemption or slave-reset. When both the inter-chassis control link and data link fail, the slave chassis changes to a master chassis or boards in the slave chassis are reset.
To view the slave chassis mode, run the display split-resume command.
The slave chassis mode can be set using the set split-resume { fast-preemption | slave-reset } command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
